sentences.sContent: You can hang up your raincoat there.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can hang up your raincoat there.
sentences.sCn: 你可以把雨衣挂在那儿。

sentences.sContent: She pinned the poppy to his raincoat.
sentences.sContent_eng: She pinned the poppy to his raincoat.
sentences.sCn: 她把罂粟花别在了他的雨衣上。

sentences.sContent: MODINE: No rumpled raincoat. I have to ask you some questions now.
sentences.sContent_eng: MODINE: No rumpled raincoat. I have to ask you some questions now.
sentences.sCn: 摩丁： 没有皱皱的雨衣。我现在得问你一些问题了。

remMethod.val: rain(下雨)+coat(外套)→下雨时穿的外套→雨衣

trans.tranOther: a coat that you wear to protect yourself from rain
